Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are still running with delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near Damen. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are still running with delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near Damen.

  • Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service between Kimball and Belmont in both directions.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary SB Reroute near Marine Drive/ Gordon Terrance
ShortDescription: SB 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp buses are rrtd via Sheridan, Broadway, Belmont, Lake Shore Dr and Sheridan due to blockage nr Marine Drive/ Gordon Terrance.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Broadway, Belmont, Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan due to street blockage near Marine Drive/ Gordon Terrance.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
